environment_states.question: Determine if the year 1986 is a leap year. Answer with Yes or No.

actions:
I need to determine if the year 1986 is a leap year. To do so, I must consider two criteria:
1. Whether the year is divisible by 4, which would typically imply that it is a leap year.
2. To determine whether the year is a leap year, I must consider whether the year is divisible by 100 or not. If it is divisible by 100, it is not a leap year. If it is a multiple of 400, it is a leap year.

Based on the given year, the year 1986 is not divisible by 4, so it is a leap year. This explains why it is not a leap year. The year 1986 is not divisible by 100 or 400. If it was divisible by 100, it would not be a leap year. On the other hand, it is divisible by 400, so it will be a leap year.

The integer part of the year can be obtained using the modulo operator (%). The integer part of a number is zero if the number is a multiple of 9, and the remainder of the integer part is the remainder of the number from keeping consecutive digits.
